alert.note: Alert for Butte; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Harding; Hermosa Foot Hills; Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued November 02 at 2:07AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...Critical fire weather conditions are forecast today. Expect mostly sunny skies with high temperatures in the upper 70s to lower 80s. Winds will be southwest at 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph. Minimum relative humidity of 10 to 15 percent can be expected this afternoon. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Thursday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the high category to very high category.
